main event: Three erratic lights were observed in the sky over Yosemite National Park for about 15 seconds.
interesting points: The objects moved at speeds far above normal aircraft speeds,The lights appeared to hover then moved in a zig-zag pattern,The sighting lasted for a duration of 15 seconds,The observer described the lights as bright and clear against the sky,No sound was recorded during the sighting.
sighted object: three erratic lights in the sky
witness description: A 17-year-old male with no prior experience in such matters
